summary.copy: TED is an annual event where the world’s leading thinkers and doers are invited to share their passions. “TED” stands for Technology, Entertainment, Design–three broad subject areas that are shaping our future. Attendees have called it “the ultimate brain spa.” Interested?

howcanwehelpyou.title: What is TED and how can we help you?
howcanwehelpyou.copy:
TED is an annual event where the world’s leading thinkers and doers are invited to share their passions. “TED” stands for Technology, Entertainment, Design–three broad subject areas that are shaping our future. Attendees have called it “the ultimate brain spa.” The diverse audience– CEOs, scientists, creatives, philanthropists–is almost as extraordinary as the speakers, who have included Bill Clinton, Bill Gates, Jane Goodall, Frank Gehry, Steve Jobs, Sir Richard Branson and Bono.

In-kind Donations are also greatly appreciated! See below for an explicit list of benefits. For more information please refer to our TEDxBerkeley Sponsorship Deck and TEDxBerkeley Flyer

benefitsofsponsorship.preface: Sponsors receive a variety of benefits, from day-of tickets to recognition across our social media platforms and general media.
benefits: Recognition in slide shows and programs

sponsors_mosaic.title: Meet our Sponsors
sponsors_mosaic.content: These are our very generous 2017 event sponsors, committed to ideas worth spreading. Come to our event to see what they have to offer: from drinks to snacks to the newest innovations.
